sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.UserFieldsUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>UserFieldsUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var UserFieldsUtil = Class.create();
UserFieldsUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	isVIP: function (){
		var user = this.getParameter('sysparm_user');
		var grUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		grUser.addQuery('sys_id', user);
		grUser.query();
		if (grUser.next()){
			return grUser.vip;
		}
		else {
			return false;
		}
	},
	
    type: 'UserFieldsUtil'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-02-17 17:52:27</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>282cfd682f710110d8a4d5f62799b68f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>UserFieldsUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_282cfd682f710110d8a4d5f62799b68f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-02-17 19:10:10</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>409</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
